physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Large left-sided parotid abscess, small left cervical and submandibular lymphadenopathy, left lower motor neuron facial nerve palsy. Tympanic membrane distorted.
Lesions completely healed with only residual scarring and no neurological sequelae.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Neck lesion healed and facial palsy resolved 2 weeks after changing antibiotics.
